inputParameters.name: node
inputParameters.description: A selection of the nodes in the diagram. Defaults to all the nodes.

inputParameters.name: edge
inputParameters.description: A selection of the edges in the diagram. Defaults to all the edges.

inputParameters.name: load_min
inputParameters.description: The minimum load magnitude to plot. Defaults to 1e-3.

inputParameters.name: load_scale
inputParameters.description: The scaling factor of the loads. Defaults to 1.

outputParameters.name: nodes
outputParameters.description: The nodes in the diagram as points.

outputParameters.name: origin_nodes
outputParameters.description: The origin nodes in the diagram as points.

outputParameters.name: support_nodes
outputParameters.description: The position of the support nodes in the diagram.

outputParameters.name: edges
outputParameters.description: The edges in the diagram as lines.

outputParameters.name: trail_edges
outputParameters.description: The trail edges in the diagram as lines.

outputParameters.name: deviation_edges
outputParameters.description: The deviation edges in the diagram as lines.

outputParameters.name: loads
outputParameters.description: The applied node loads as lines.
